item.title: 卢布、澳元受关注，美元扩大涨幅
item.description: 加元和澳元在本周央行会议前成为周一的焦点，而欧元和其他主要货币则因美元走强而略有下跌。【原文：The Canadian dollar and Australian dollar were in focus on Monday ahead of their central bank meetings this week, while the euro and other major currencies lost a bit more ground to a strong U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 早间竞价叙利亚匆忙沦陷，市场保持冷静
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole】

item.title: 大众汽车与工人就工厂停工问题举行新一轮谈判
item.description: 大众汽车和劳工代表将就减薪和可能的工厂关闭问题举行第四轮谈判，双方的僵持已变得越来越激烈，周一这家汽车制造商在德国的主要生产基地还将举行罢工。【原文：Volkswagen and labour representatives will hold a fourth round of talks over wage cuts and possible plant closures, in what has become an increasingly bitter standoff that will be flanked by strikes at the carmaker's main German sites on Monday.】

item.title: 数据显示，2024 年日本破产数量将创 11 年新高
item.description: 东京商工研究所（TSR）的私营部门数据周一显示，在下周备受关注的央行会议召开之前，日本今年的破产申请将突破1万件，创下2013年以来的最高纪录。【原文：Japan's bankruptcy filings this year are set to surpass 10,000 and hit the highest since 2013, private-sector data by Tokyo Shoko Research (TSR) showed on Monday, ahead of a closely watched central bank meeting next week.】

item.title: 花旗集团的哈里什-拉曼（Harish Raman）被委以扩大的亚洲 ECM 职务
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份备忘录，花旗集团已任命哈里什-拉曼（Harish Raman）为其北亚、南亚和澳大利亚股票资本市场（ECM）执行、发起和解决方案业务主管。【原文：Citigroup has appointed Harish Raman as the head of its equity capital markets (ECM) execution, origination and solutions business for Asia North, Asia South and Australia, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 由于工厂将库存转移到海外，中国 11 月出口可能增长 8.5%：路透调查
item.description: 中国 11 月份的出口可能有所增长，增速低于上个月的丰收数据，但仍延续了乐观趋势，因为中国出口商可能在美国新政府关税风险不断增加的情况下提前发货。【原文：China's exports likely grew in November, slower than last month's bumper data but continuing an upbeat trend as Chinese exporters likely frontloaded shipments amid growing tariff risks from the incoming U.S. administration.】

item.title: 中国 11 月消费通胀率创五个月新低
item.description: 11 月份，中国的消费通胀率创下了五个月来的新低，而生产价格通缩则持续存在，尽管近期的经济刺激措施为经济提供了支持。【原文：China's consumer inflation hit a five-month low in November, while producer price deflation persisted, even as the economy received support from recent stimulus efforts.】

item.title: 中国 11 月消费通胀放缓
item.description: 11 月份，中国居民消费价格涨幅放缓，而生产者价格通货紧缩依然存在，尽管经济得到了近期刺激措施的支持。【原文：China's consumer prices rose at a slower pace in November, while producer price deflation persisted, even as the economy received support from recent stimulus efforts.】

item.title: 比亚迪有望实现 2024 年销售目标，销量超过福特和本田
item.description: 中国最大的电动汽车生产商比亚迪将在下周一公布的 11 月份汽车销量数据中进一步提高市场份额，从而有望超额完成年度目标，在全球销量上超越福特和本田。【原文：China's top electric vehicle producer BYD is set to show further market share gains when November vehicle sales data is released on Monday, putting it on course to exceed its annual goal and overtake Ford and Honda in global sales.】

item.title: 韩国拖累亚洲股市；央行本周工作繁忙
item.description: 亚洲股市周一受到韩国股市下滑的拖累，本周央行会议将密集举行，借贷成本应会进一步降低，而美国通胀数据是美国进一步放宽政策的最后一道障碍。【原文：Asian shares were dragged by a slide in South Korea on Monday ahead of a packed week of central bank meetings that should see borrowing costs take a step lower, while U.S. inflation data are the last hurdle to a further policy easing there.】

item.title: 澳大利亚伍尔沃斯公司提高工人工资以解决罢工问题
item.description: 澳大利亚顶级杂货商伍尔沃斯公司（Woolworths）周一表示，它已与行业工会工人达成了增加工资的协议，解决了影响全澳大利亚伍尔沃斯超市门店服务水平的罢工行动。【原文：Australia's top grocer Woolworths said on Monday it has reached an agreement with industrial union workers to increase wages, resolving the strike action that had been affecting store service levels at Woolworths supermarkets across Australia.】

item.title: REC 调查显示，预算案后对英国工人的需求急剧下降
item.description: 周一公布的一项调查显示，在工党新政府公布首份预算案后，英国上个月的用工需求骤减，其他迹象也表明了增税对雇主的影响。【原文：Demand for workers in Britain collapsed last month after the new Labour government's first budget, a survey published on Monday showed, adding to other signs of the impact of the tax increases on employers.】

item.title: 日本第三季度国内生产总值因资本支出和出口而上调
item.description: 得益于资本投资和出口的上调，日本经济在 7 月至 9 月间的扩张速度快于最初的报告。【原文：Japan's economy expanded in July-September at a faster pace than initially reported, thanks to upward revisions in capital investment and exports.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势加剧抵消需求担忧，油价涨跌互现
item.description: 周一亚洲早盘，油价涨跌不一，因为对中国需求疲软的担忧被叙利亚总统巴沙尔-阿萨德被叛军推翻后中东地区日益紧张的局势所抵消。【原文：Oil prices were mixed in early Asia trade on Monday as concerns over weak Chinese demand were offset by rising tensions in the Middle East following the rebel overthrow of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad.】

item.title: 研究显示，酷暑给制衣厂工人带来风险
item.description: 新的欧盟法规规定，Inditex、H&M 和耐克等零售商要对其供应商的条件承担法律责任，这给他们带来了压力，迫使他们为改善其采购的冷却工厂提供资金。【原文：New EU regulations make retailers like Inditex, H&M and Nike legally liable for conditions at their suppliers, putting pressure on them to help fund improvements to cool factories they source from.】

item.title: 在海湾地区的比特币聚会上，特朗普家族和盟友沉浸在加密货币行业的喜悦中
item.description: 随着数字货币屡创新高，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的新加密货币企业的几位关键人物周一将前往阿布扎比，参加海湾地区最大的比特币聚会。【原文：Several key players in President-elect Donald Trump's new cryptocurrency venture head to Abu Dhabi on Monday for the largest bitcoin gathering in the Gulf region as the digital currency sets record highs.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，特朗普助手就网上售药问题与谷歌、Meta 和 Snap 联系
item.description: Snap 和 TikTok 也在其中。【原文：Snap and TikTok also were included.】

item.title: 消息人士称安联集团与 Amundi 停止合并资产管理业务谈判
item.description: 一位与安联关系密切的消息人士称，安联和 Amundi 已暂停讨论将其资产管理业务合并为一家欧洲投资巨头的事宜，该巨头将管理近 2.8 万亿欧元（3 万亿美元）的资产。【原文：Allianz and Amundi have paused discussions about combining their asset management businesses into a European investment giant that would manage nearly 2.8 trillion euros ($3 trillion) in assets, a source close to Allianz said.】

item.title: 特朗普称不会试图撤换美联储主席鲍威尔
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在周日播出的一次访谈中表示，他不会试图在 1 月份上任后撤换美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said in an interview aired on Sunday he will not try to replace Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell upon taking office in January.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 VinFast 将在越南建设第二家生产厂
item.description: 越南电动汽车（EV）制造商 VinFast 周日宣布了一项计划，将在国内建设第二家生产厂，届时其产能将翻一番，并表示有必要满足对其中小型车型日益增长的需求。【原文：Vietnamese electric vehicle (EV) manufacturer VinFast on Sunday announced a plan to build its second domestic production plant that will double its output capacity, saying it is needed to meet increased demand for its small and mid-sized models.】

item.title: 蚂蚁金服总裁韩志国将于 3 月出任 CEO，井贤栋留任董事长
item.description: 在金融科技公司最大的一次组织变革中，Han 于今年 3 月出任总裁。【原文：Han became president in March during the fintech's biggest organisational change.】

item.title: 美国众议院将投票决定提供 30 亿美元拆除中国电信设备
item.description: 美国众议院将于下周就年度国防法案进行投票，其中包括向美国电信公司提供略高于 30 亿美元的资金，用于从美国无线网络中移除中国电信公司华为和中兴制造的设备，以应对安全风险。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives is set to vote next week on an annual defense bill that includes just over $3 billion for U.S. telecom companies to remove equipment made by Chinese telecoms firms Huawei and ZTE from American wireless networks to address security risks.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨：关闭大众工厂 "不是正确的做法
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）说，关闭工厂将是大众汽车的错误行为，并补充说这家欧洲最大的汽车制造商对其员工负有责任。【原文：Factory shutdowns would be a wrong move by Volkswagen , German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said, adding that Europe's largest carmaker had a responsibility to its employees.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行称准备与法国农业信贷银行就 BPM 银行问题坐下来谈
item.description: 意大利农业信贷银行发言人在 LinkedIn 上发帖称，意大利联合信贷银行已准备好与法国农业信贷银行坐下来谈，此前法国农业信贷银行增持了联合信贷银行收购目标 Banco BPM 的潜在股份。【原文：UniCredit is ready to sit down with Credit Agricole , a spokesperson for the Italian bank said in a LinkedIn post after the French lender increased its potential stake in Unicredit's takeover target Banco BPM .】

item.title: Axios 称，美国批准根据微软协议向阿联酋出口先进的人工智能芯片
item.description: 据《Axios》周六援引两位熟悉该交易的人士的话报道，美国政府已批准向微软在阿拉伯联合酋长国运营的一家工厂出口先进的人工智能芯片，这是该公司与阿联酋人工智能公司 G42 高度谨慎的合作关系的一部分。【原文：The U.S. government has approved the export of advanced artificial intelligence chips to a Microsoft-operated facility in the United Arab Emirates as part of the company's highly-scrutinized partnership with Emirati AI firm G42, Axios reported on Saturday, citing two people familiar with the deal.】

item.title: 独家：消息称意大利非正式支持法国农业信贷银行增持 BPM 股份
item.description: 两位接近此事的消息人士告诉路透社，法国农业信贷银行周五表示将增持 Banco BPM 股份之前，已得到意大利政府的非正式支持。【原文：France's Credit Agricole had informal backing from the Italian government before it said on Friday it was raising its stake in Banco BPM , two sources close to the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 TikTok 内容创作者警告追随者在 Instagram 和 YouTube 上找到他们
item.description: TikTok 上的美国内容创作者要求粉丝们订阅他们在 Meta 旗下 Instagram 和 Alphabet 旗下 YouTube 等竞争对手平台上的频道，因为联邦上诉法院裁定，如果不在 1 月 19 日前将该社交媒体应用程序出售给一家美国公司，该应用程序就可能被禁用。【原文：American content creators on TikTok asked followers to subscribe to their channels on rival platforms like Meta-owned Instagram and Alphabet's YouTube after a federal appeals court ruled that the social media app could be banned if it is not sold to a U.S.-based company by Jan. 19.】

item.title: 数据显示，在 TikTok 面临禁令威胁之际，美国在 TikTok Shop 上的消费有所增长
item.description: 根据TikTok的估计和路透社对Facteus数据测试出的消费模式的分析，到目前为止，美国TikTok用户在这个假日购物季花费巨资购买了电子商务平台TikTok Shop上一系列供应商的商品。【原文：U.S. TikTok users spent heavily to buy merchandise from a range of vendors on the e-commerce platform TikTok Shop so far this holiday shopping season, according to TikTok estimates and a Reuters analysis of spending patterns measured by data from Facteus.】

item.title: CFM 获得 LEAP-1A 发动机耐久性修复的监管认证
item.description: 喷气发动机制造商 CFM 国际公司周五表示，美国和欧洲的航空监管机构已经为其 LEAP-1A 发动机认证了一种 "更耐用 "的高压涡轮组件，该发动机为空中客车公司的窄体喷气机提供动力。【原文：Jet engine maker CFM International said on Friday aviation regulators in the United States and Europe have certified a "more durable" high-pressure turbine kit for its LEAP-1A engines that power the narrowbody jets of Airbus .】
